name: Find the Birds
description:
Find the Birds is a free to play educational game about birds and conservation. There are no paid upgrades nor ads.

It is a 2D simulated birdwatching experience. Player travel the globe, to places such as Illinois (USA), Japan, Arizona (USA), and British Columbia (Canada). Once there, they explore and try to find local birds, some of which are endangered. For finding them, the receive points. They then use these points in the simulated stores to exchange for tools to do quests to help the birds, such as placing nest boxes.

Players can also take photos using the camera tool interface and store them in their simulated album using that interface. Player use such icons and interfaces to play the game.
